name: LIONKILLER
description:
LIONKILLER is a choice based game set in northern China during the First Opium War.  Please the cosmos. cheat a Jesuit. and/or kiss a girl.  There are multiple endings to PART ONE, so you'll have to play the game at least twice to see all of the major content. 

Content warnings for misogyny, mentions of drug use, mild sexual content, and mild violence. 

This game is experimental, and some mechanics may be changed or removed in future installments. If there's enough interest in this game then I'll make the part 2. If you'd just like to tip me, that's cool too. 

Design, writing, art assets, and code by Sisi
